CPU Pipeline Stall CPU Pipeline Stall. This is the logical OR of all possible CPU stall sources.
STALL GROUP 1
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 1
1 2000
Debug Halt CPU Pipeline stalled due to debug halt
STALL GROUP 2
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 2
1 2001
L1P Stall Program Cache not ready stall.
STALL GROUP 3
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 3
1 2002
Branch Mispredict CPU Pipeline stalled due to branch mispredict. Includes SYSCALLs.
STALL GROUP 4
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 4
1 2003
L1D Stall Data Cache not readyto accept next transaction.
STALL GROUP 5
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 5
1 2014
UTLB Data uTLB not ready stall.
STALL GROUP 6
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 6
1 2005
MFENCE Stall Waiting on MFENCE to resolve, or waiting on L1D to accept all writes before issueing a SEOPEN, or waiting for memory system to go IDLE before entering the IDLE state.
STALL GROUP 7
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 7
1 2006
MVC Stall Internal Control register synchronization stall.
STALL GROUP 8
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 8
1 2007
UNPROT Crosspath Stall In UNPROT mode, the compiler should have eliminated all xpath stalls.
STALL GROUP 9
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 9
1 2008
Control Register Access Stall Control Register Access Stall.
STALL GROUP 10
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 10
1 2009
Instruction Hazard (DIV, MOD) Stall DIV or MOD instruciton issued while DIV or MOD instruction executing.
STALL GROUP 11

1 2010
Streaming Address Generator Stall Streaming Address Generator usage stall.
STALL GROUP 12

1 2011
Trace Stall CPU Pipeline Stall due to request from Trace logic.
STALL GROUP 13

1 2012
Streaming Engine Not Ready Stall Any stall due to SE instruction which cannot start due to SE not ready.
STALL GROUP 14

1 2013

STALL GROUP 15

1 2014
Crosspath Stall Crosspath stall, including raw hazard on xpath read.
STALL GROUP 16

1 2015
Crosspath RAW Hazard Stall Read-after-Write hazard on crosspath store data read.
STALL GROUP 17
CPU STALL GROUP FOR PROFILE 17
1 2016
Any RAW Hazard Stall Any Read-after-Write hazard.
STALL GROUP 18

1 2017
Any RAW Hazard in UNPROT Stall Any Read-after-Write hazard while in UNPROT mode (this will generally be caused by L1D read misses).
STALL GROUP 19

1 2018
Any WAW Hazard Stall Any Write-after-Write hazard.
STALL GROUP 20
